appShortcutName: Metro - A music player for Android
appDisplayName: Metro - A music player for Android
description:
Best material design music player for Android Metro is a fork of Retro Music with Google Play API removed and all pro features unlocked. Features:
  • Local playback only (based on the MediaStore)
  • Sleep timer
  • Folder browser
  • Home screen widgets
  • Themes (Just Black, Kinda Dark, Clearly White)
  • Now playing themes
  • Volume controls
  • Blacklist
  • Album artist support
  • Auto-download artist images from Last.fm
